artist: Artist: Spurious signature and seal of Kano Tsunenobu
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Crosby, Jr.
description: Central scroll of a triptych. Elderly man with long bamboo staff with white deer. Identifiable as Jurojin the god of longevity.
markings: Spurious artist seal, LR: 養朴 {Yōboku}
signed: Spurious artist signature, LR: 法眼古川筆 {Hōgen Furukawa hitsu}
title: God of Longevity (Jurōjin), from a triptych of Jurōjin and Cranes
